lead_paragraph: Billionaire investor Carl Icahn offered $20 million in financing on Thursday to keep the Trump Taj Mahal from becoming the fifth casino to close this year in New Jersey's troubled Atlantic City, was once the only major destination for gamblers on the U.S. East Coast.

headline.main: Icahn Offers $20 Million to Keep Atlantic City Trump Casino Open
headline.print_headline: Icahn Offers $20 Million to Keep Atlantic City Trump Casino Open
